sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import {Container, Button} from '../../globalStyles'
import { 
    AboutSec, 
    Header, 
    Columns, 
    Column1,
    Column1Title,
    Column1Body, 
    Column2,
    Column2Body,
    Column2Title } from "./AboutSection.elements";

const AboutSection = ({
    lightBg,
}) => {
    return (
        <>
            <AboutSec>
                <Container>
                    <Header>Here is why we exist</Header>
                    <Columns>
                        <Column1>
                        <Column1Title>  Raising Transparency in the hiring process </Column1Title>
                        <Column1Body>
                        Fundraising is hard enough as is, let alone when you have no clue who you're dealing with. 
                        We believe raising transparency in the startup fundraising ecosystem will create a net 
                        positive for everyone involved.
                        </Column1Body>
                        </Column1>
                        <Column2>
                        <Column2Title> Supporting Founders </Column2Title>
                        <Column2Body>
                        Building a business is f*cking hard work! We're passionate about supporting founders on their 
                        journey in any way that we can, and are building out a roadmap of products that reflects that.
                        </Column2Body>
                        </Column2>
                    </Columns>

                    <Link to="/">
                    <Button >
                        Geza
                    </Button>
                    </Link>
                </Container>
            </AboutSec>
        </>
    )
}

export default AboutSection;
